column4: Okay, after experimenting and going through guides, I give up doing it alone. Can someone help me get my sound running? Just installed Ubuntu 10.04, I know speakers work because they worked in Kubuntu and Windows before this, but now not in Ubuntu.
You did check the simple things first? like the alsa-mixer tool to make sure the sounds are not just muted/turned down low.
Pulse Audio has been in ubuntu for some time now.
Yep, alsamixer is reading everything at 100%.
